title: East India Cotton association Prices - October 04 2019
text:
East India Cotton association Prices - October 04 2019

Commodities 50 minutes ago (Oct 04, 2019 21:50)

© Reuters. East India Cotton association Prices - October 04 2019 BANGALORE, October 04(Reuters) - The following are the daily Cotton prices supplied by Indian based East India Cotton Association. The prices are in Indian Rupees per Candy (355.62 Kgs). PRODUCTS CURRENT RAW COTTON(STAPLE)---------------------- Grade Staple Per Standard Candy ICS-101 Below 38300 ICS-201 Below 38700 ICS-102 - ICS-103 - ICS-104 - ICS-202 27mm 37700 ICS-105 - ICS-105 27mm 38100 ICS-105 - ICS-105 - ICS-105 28mm 38400 ICS-105 - ICS-105 - ICS-105 - ICS-105 - ICS-105 - ICS-105 - ICS-106 - ICS-107
